name: InterviewPractice
0:
”Alexa, open Interview Practice”
”Alexa, start Interview Practice”
”Alexa, begin Interview Practice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: interview practice
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Interview Practice by Prepfit

Watch the intro: 
https://youtu.be/uxBbmfITAvs

PRACTICE from a pool of 500 frequently asked general inquiry and soft skill job interview questions.

PERFECT how long you speak with a built-in stopwatch 

CHOOSE from three pools of questions:
• Random selection
• Basic (or general inquiry)
• Behavioral (or situational, hypothetical, and conceptual)

SAY things like to iterate and improve:
• Repeat the question
• New question
• Re-practice the last question
• Give me a related question
• Wait a second

ACTIVATE it now
• Click “Enable” on this skill page
• Say “Alexa, Open Interview Practice”
• Listen for an interview question
• Start practicing your answer
• When you’re done, say “Alexa, Next”
• A timer tells you how long your answer took

RATE this skill to say thanks! 
REVIEW this skill to suggest improvements! 
EMAIL me directly via (terry@prepfit.com)
MADE with ❤️ at Prepfit
priv:
